alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 9:08PM CDT until May 19 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR GARLAND...WESTERN SALINE AND CENTRAL HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 907 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Ouachita State Park to Hot Springs National Park to near Lofton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Hot Springs Village... Mountain Pine... Hot Springs Memorial Field... Jessieville... Lofton... Rockwell... Hot Springs National Park... Lake Ouachita State Park... DeGray Lake State Park... Bismarck... Red Oak... Oaklawn Racetrack... Sunshine... Mountain Valley... Royal... De Roche... Lake Catherine State Park... Gulpha Gorge... Pettyview... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
